belongs_to_collection.name: The Adventures of Dr. Dolittle Series

original_title: Doktor Dolittle und seine Tiere: Teil 2 – Die Affenbrücke - Dr. Dolittle in Gefahr
overview: On his way inland, Dr. Dolittle and his animals encounter a nasty surprise. Natives capture them and hold them under lock and key.
title: The Adventures of Dr. Dolittle: Tale 2 - Cannibal Land
